item.title: Elimination of 3 years?
item.description: This post of nonsense is written in English to avoid potential censorship of speech1. I write this post as a personal record of the chaos at the end(?) of the strict COVID regulation “era”, as well as a witness of an ongoing elimination(?) of public discussion. NOTE: I’m not quoting any factual sources here, so all will be my personal opinions.
